表格离职表的代码预览

drop index 职位与离职_FK on dimission;

drop index 员工与离职_FK on dimission;

drop index dimission_PK on dimission;

drop table if exists dimission;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: dimission */
/*==============================================================*/
create table dimission
(
dimissionid int not null,
employeeid varchar(50),
departmentid int,
dimtimes date,
dimreasona varchar(100),
primary key (dimissionid)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: dimission_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index dimission_PK on dimission
(
dimissionid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 员工与离职_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 员工与离职_FK on dimission
(
employeeid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 职位与离职_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 职位与离职_FK on dimission
(
departmentid
);

alter table dimission add constraint FK_员工与离职 foreign key (employeeid)
references employee (employeeid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table dimission add constraint FK_职位与离职 foreign key (departmentid)
references department (departmentid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
